source.bb65a0a2:
Age, Usage, Income and Miles are continuous value features.
Product, Gender, Education, MaritalStatus and Fitness are categorical features.
source.3b1bcfb1: Thanks for reading that is all from my side.
source.ed5509e9: # Analysing relation among the features that affect choice of product
source.df6568f2: Plotting histograms of the cotious features.
source.e4226a2d: People running more tend to go for the 'TM798' model.
source.36d1386b: The market research team at AdRight is assigned the task to identify the profile of the typical customer for each treadmill product offered by CardioGood Fitness.
source.7a7bfea9: From the above graph it is clear that model 'TM798' is the costliest as people with high income only invest in this model. Price difference betwee the other two model does not seem significant.
source.ea7edee6:
* Gender does not affect the choice of product in case of 'TM195' and 'TM498' whereas 'TM798' has significantly large male customers as compared to female customers. Females tend to prefer 'TM195' and 'TM498'.

* Marital Status does not affect the choice of the treadmill.
source.feddca62: Younger people with 16 years of education go for 'TM798' model and older people with 16 years of education tend to go for the other two models.
source.88d0823b: Finding the count of each categorical variable using countplot.
source.1c1a0851: Majority rate themselves as average fit as is the scenario in most of the cases. People rating themselves as 4 and 5 wants to maintain their shape.
source.773b122f: Initial guess, I would say model 'TM798' is the costliest followed by 'TM498' and 'TM195' is cheapest among the three. Judging by the count.
source.af76c99a:
Product: There are three types of treadmills mentioned in the dataset.
Age: Age of the customer in years.
Gender: Gender of the customer.
Education: Education og the customer in years.
MaritalStatus: whether the customer is single or has a partner.
Usage: Average number of times the treadmill is expected to be used per week.
Income: Annual household income in $.
Fitness: Self rated fitness of customer from 0 to 5. 0 unfit and 5 fit.
Miles: Average number of miles cutomer expects to walk/run each week.
source.f9b1b903: Suggestions are welcome in the comment section.
source.9c70fac8: How gender and marital status affect the choice of product
source.99bd82a3: Generally people in their 20s are most enthusiastic about their fitness and shape. poeple over 40 years of age use treadmill for maintaining health.
